channel.title: !Looking for Staff! PhantomX Version 4!
channel.description:
Looking for staff!
We have a webclient but it is not working right now it is in the process of working, so we have a downloadable client for you guys. I am trying to get the webclient up asap. I will tell you guys when it is ready on the server hope you guys come and enjoy. The downloadable link is this. Just copy and paste it into your address bar.
http://www.mediafire.com/download/653pj1q4dr819vt/PhantomX_client_Version_4.jar
We at PhantomX strive to bring you flawless pking. We strive for the oldschool look and feel, but bring in new and exciting updates. Along with this, we have perfected to our abilities, all specials and most weapons.
We at PhantomX strive to bring you flawless pking, pvming and skilling. We aim to create the oldschool nostalgia that many people may desire, but at the same time bring in new and exciting content that will keep you interested. Aswell as this we have created/re-done all special attacks and we've checked over most of our weapons to ensure that they are functional.
As an owner, i strive to bring the community updates as soon as possible, to my abilites. 100% of donations go towards, new vps/webhost, and you know the donation was spent well.
Features - Great Economy. You can earn money by doing every single skill. - Every single skill is trainable. Total of twenty-one to choose from. - Custom, but decent Quests. Total of four to choose from. - Great combat system and triangle, which is quite important between danger zone users. - Easy usable teleporting by emotion tab and commands, like it used to be on classic private server. - Well coded chatting system. Ability to turn your chat offline or 'friends only' and guests will see you offline. Very useful for known people, who doesn't want to be disturbed. - Online browser client, for people that don't want to download a browser client. - Deskop clients also are available, for people that doesn't want to play from browsers. - HighScores to battle for best ranks and titles, automatically updated every three hours. - Player killing table, which lists our server Top 100 best player killers. - Monthly community events and wars between player made clans. - Great and respectful administrators, who doesn't spawn or cheat, but play fairly as other players.
Join us, for flawless OSPKing

item.title: !Looking for Staff! PhantomX Version 4!
item.dc:creator: @choman choman
item.description:
@choman wrote:

Looking for staff!

We have a webclient but it is not working right now it is in the process of working, so we have a downloadable client for you guys. I am trying to get the webclient up asap. I will tell you guys when it is ready on the server hope you guys come and enjoy. The downloadable link is this. Just copy and paste it into your address bar.

http://www.mediafire.com/download/653pj1q4dr819vt/PhantomX_client_Version_4.jar

We at PhantomX strive to bring you flawless pking. We strive for the oldschool look and feel, but bring in new and exciting updates. Along with this, we have perfected to our abilities, all specials and most weapons.

                                                         We at PhantomX strive to bring you flawless pking, pvming and skilling. We aim to create the oldschool nostalgia that many people may desire, but at the same time bring in new and exciting content that will keep you interested. Aswell as this we have created/re-done all special attacks and we've checked over most of our weapons to ensure that they are functional.

As an owner, i strive to bring the community updates as soon as possible, to my abilites. 100% of donations go towards, new vps/webhost, and you know the donation was spent well.

Features
- Great Economy. You can earn money by doing every single skill.
- Every single skill is trainable. Total of twenty-one to choose from.
- Custom, but decent Quests. Total of four to choose from.
- Great combat system and triangle, which is quite important between danger zone users.
- Easy usable teleporting by emotion tab and commands, like it used to be on classic private server.
- Well coded chatting system. Ability to turn your chat offline or ‘friends only’ and guests will see you offline. Very useful for known people, who doesn’t want to be disturbed.
- Online browser client, for people that don’t want to download a browser client.
- Deskop clients also are available, for people that doesn’t want to play from browsers.
- HighScores to battle for best ranks and titles, automatically updated every three hours.
- Player killing table, which lists our server Top 100 best player killers.
- Monthly community events and wars between player made clans.
- Great and respectful administrators, who doesn’t spawn or cheat, but play fairly as other players.

Join us, for flawless OSPKing

Read full topic
